moduleMetadataJson.name: Apple TV Image Remote Control
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will show an image on an AppleTV device for a period of time.
        Some AppleTV devices are actually password-protected, in that case please
        set the PASSWORD datastore option. For password brute forcing, please see
        the module auxiliary/scanner/http/appletv_login.
author: 0a29406d9794e4f9b30b3c5d6702c708
sinn3r <sinn3r@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: VERBOSE
options.description: Enable detailed status messages

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: RPORT
options.description: The target port

options.name: SSL
options.description: Negotiate SSL/TLS for outgoing connections

options.name: Proxies
options.description: A proxy chain of format type:host:port[,type:host:port][...]

options.name: UserAgent
options.description: The User-Agent header to use for all requests

options.name: HttpUsername
options.description: The HTTP username to specify for authentication

options.name: HttpPassword
options.description: The password for AppleTV AirPlay

options.name: HttpRawHeaders
options.description: Path to ERB-templatized raw headers to append to existing headers

options.name: SSLVersion
options.description: Specify the version of SSL/TLS to be used (Auto, TLS and SSL23 are auto-negotiate) (Accepted: Auto, TLS, SSL23, SSL3, TLS1, TLS1.1, TLS1.2)

options.name: FingerprintCheck
options.description: Conduct a pre-exploit fingerprint verification

options.name: HttpClientTimeout
options.description: HTTP connection and receive timeout

options.name: HttpPartialResponses
options.description: Return partial HTTP responses despite timeouts

options.name: HttpTrace
options.description: Show the raw HTTP requests and responses

options.name: HttpTraceHeadersOnly
options.description: Show HTTP headers only in HttpTrace

options.name: HttpTraceColors
options.description: HTTP request and response colors for HttpTrace (unset to disable)

options.name: HTTP::version_random_valid
options.description: Use a random, but valid, HTTP version for request

options.name: HTTP::version_random_invalid
options.description: Use a random invalid, HTTP version for request

options.name: TIME
options.description: Time in seconds to show the image

options.name: FILE
options.description: Image to upload and show
